title: White Horse (Taylor's Version)
description:
Taylor's fairytale continues but much like real life, there are a lot of questions... and Nick, Ana, Amy and Lacey attempt to answer them all! Who is this song about? Why is this one of Taylor's favs? And how does she find the emotion to record it again?
A special thanks to this episode's sponsor, Grove Collaborative! Making the switch to natural products has never been easier. For a limited time, go to Grove.co/SWIFT you will get to choose a FREE gift with your first order of $30 or more... but don't forget to use our code to get that free gift!
What did we overlook? What did we forget to mention? Let us know everything that you are thinking! There are so many ways to reach us.

CONTACT THE PODCAST!
Email – the13podcast@gmail.com
IG: https://www.instagram.com/the13podcast
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@the13podcast

CHECK OUT OUR OTHER PODCASTS!

Ana - "On Cloud Wine"
Nick – "Shut Up!" & "The Chatty Daddies"

This podcast is in no way related to or endorsed by Taylor Swift, her companies, or record labels. All opinions are our own.
